Customer Reviews

Emily Smith
2 half-marathons
I didn't know what to buy, so I turned to the guys from Runsmart - they picked a heart rate monitor that fit my goals and financial possibilities. Later, I decided to update my gadget and went straight back to them. New goals - a new gadget! Thank you, RunSmart!
Oliver Brown
1 half-marathon
Heart rate monitors are cool! Usually, I ran without them and didn't know I was making it worse. Bought one, and also got a training session as a gift. They taught me how to use my new gadget and explained the basics of anatomy, and made a training plan for a month. With them, I prepared for my first half-marathon! Thanks!!!
Charlotte Johnson
2 half-marathons
I couldn't start running for a long time because I would begin but then it became hard and I gave up. Heard about RunSmart and pulse control running from friends and decided to try. I called them, they were interested in my goals and picked a very interesting option with a discount! Now I run and enjoy it! I've already run 2 half-marathons and several shorter races and don't plan to stop. Thank you!!!
Missouri, USA
